item.description:
We had a great Friday night at The Lounge At Sake, a sleek little upscale lounge in the rear of the popular Japanese-food joint, Sake Portsmouthand want to bring you all next time!

Join the Cocktail Meetup group for cocktails and a sake powered dance party on Friday August 13th starting at 9 pm.The party features music by DJ FLEX and plenty of Mai Tai's and Scorpion Bowl drink specials. If you missed the last meetup you might want to try the Yoko Ono Martini on August 13th.

Never a Cover

Full Menu served during Dance Party!

Leave the decks on Friday night and come join us at the Sake Powered Party in Portsmouth on Friday August 13th! Don't forget to bring your Poken and network at night!
item.name: Cocktailing at Sake Portsmouth
